trans-unit.source: Provides information about the intersection between the geometries in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters" /> and the visual which was hit.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters" /> 中之幾何與所點擊視覺物件之間的交集資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the relationship between the hit test geometry (the blue circle) and the visual geometry (the red square).
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示之點擊的測試的幾何 （藍色圓形） 和 visual 幾何 （紅色方格） 之間的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram of IntersectionDetail used in hit testing](~/add/media/intersectiondetail01.png "Diagram of IntersectionDetail used in hit testing")
trans-unit.target: ![圖表中使用之 IntersectionDetail 的點擊測試](~/add/media/intersectiondetail01.png "圖表的 IntersectionDetail 在點擊測試")

trans-unit.source: Intersection between hit test geometry and visual geometry during hit testing
trans-unit.target: 點擊的測試幾何與 visual 幾何的交集在點擊測試期間

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult.IntersectionDetail%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult.IntersectionDetail%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> hit test parameter and the target visual, or geometry, do not intersect.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 點擊測試參數和目標視覺物件 (或幾何) 沒有交集。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> hit test parameter is fully contained within the boundary of the target visual or geometry.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 點擊測試參數完全包含在目標視覺物件 (或幾何) 的界限內。

trans-unit.source: The target visual, or geometry, is fully inside the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> hit test parameter.
trans-unit.target: 目標視覺物件 (或幾何) 完全位在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 點擊測試參數內。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> hit test parameter and the target visual, or geometry, intersect.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 點擊測試參數與目標視覺物件 (或幾何) 有所交集。

trans-unit.source: This means that the two elements overlap, but neither element contains the other.
trans-unit.target: 這表示兩個項目重疊，但是沒有一個項目完全包含在另一個項目內。
